name: Chosun Zombie Defense (Free Demo)
description:
CZD is currently in EARLY ACCESS!

(Full version : Quest Only / Demo : PCVR,  Oculus)

CZD is a stage-based zombie defense VR game where players eliminate the approaching zombies using weapons from the Korean Dynasty era.

How To Play

Use the unique abilities and the Ultimates of each weapon to strike down the zombies! Use random skills that you can obtain after clearing a wave!

Game Objective

The goal of the game is to clear the stages while immersed in historical Korean locations filled with unique zombies.

Key Features

Relish the satisfaction of eliminating zombies by combining various weapons and skills.

Applab Store Link ( Full Version )
